Returns 1 if Number is positive, 0 if it is zero and -1 if it is negative.

discussion.p: The Sign function returns 1 if Number is positive, 0 if it is zero and -1 if it is negative.

example.caption: Sign() function executed on the Northwind Access database

page.example: SELECT FIRST 1 Sign(-12) AS EXPR1, SIGN(4) AS EXPR2 FROM Products = -1|1
